channel.title: Multi account?
channel.description:
Went to use the ender farm and find its been rez protected but I think its a multi account doing it. Heres my screen shot [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/dx3u9.png[/img]
Ive never seen a player named Jbolsahck and its odd to me the other permissions are all long time players. Seems like the castle crew

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Sounds familiar, I’m trying to dig up some logs that Moparisthebest posted a while back now to see if we can find out who did it and what we can do in the future to stop it causing any issues.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

In other news… We’re now smashing unheard-of records! Never before have we seen such activity for 10 minutes before this day of days! Fantastic!

What I really mean though is that the server was attacked by a pack of raving bots today, however the player limit kept all in order. Didn’t want to make a topic about this, so posting it here. I didn’t think of /whois’ing the players, so you can pick names out of the list if you want to follow it up for connections.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Your call

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:19, topic:443098”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=545787.msg4004475#msg4004475 date=1338472683]
With that being said, how is our removal of use of the xp farm from you unfair/taking potential from the end? You are still able to venture in the end as you always have.
[/quote]

If you think about it logically it makes perfect sense, if there are multiple XP farms then the chance of another person being at a different location within the end is increased, whereas if there is just one XP farm it allows everyone to use the XP farm thus eliminating pretty much any chance of the spawn rates being ruined.

I’m not interested in making you open it, at the end of the day, you’re right it is your XP farm and it is your decision but I’m simply saying it is pretty selfish from where other people are standing.[/quote]

Far from it, what would have been selfish is if i denied access to it from the get-go, im not selfish for closing it after actions other members have done to anger me or other members of ‘the castle crew’; im not talking about some random person either.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

badger41:

With that being said, how is our removal of use of the xp farm from you unfair/taking potential from the end? You are still able to venture in the end as you always have.

If you think about it logically it makes perfect sense, if there are multiple XP farms then the chance of another person being at a different location within the end is increased, whereas if there is just one XP farm it allows everyone to use the XP farm thus eliminating pretty much any chance of the spawn rates being ruined.

I’m not interested in making you open it, at the end of the day, you’re right it is your XP farm and it is your decision but I’m simply saying it is pretty selfish from where other people are standing.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“Tom, post:17, topic:443098”]The issue with this is that it isn’t any ordinary XP farm, effectively there can only be one ender farm before the spawn rates become a little jacked up, or it gets over crowded. This isn’t like a farm in the regular world where the entire server can be using 10 different spawners, if there is somebody outside the XP farm while you’re using it nothing will work.

Quite frankly, it isn’t fair that you dive in first and then deny the community a right to use the end to its full potential. I’m still yet to get any reasoning what so ever from you, or any of your castle residence in regard to what happened that caused you take this “luxury” (or more basic right) away from the community.

As for the multiple accounts, we will see, I’ve never seen him online so I’ll be watching very closely when the residence expires.[/quote]

What??? lol? Before i start even listing other points, id like to add that most of you (tarkoff, relmitos, tom, etc) rarely went into the end before knowing about this xp farm.

With that being said, how is our removal of use of the xp farm from you unfair/taking potential from the end? You are still able to venture in the end as you always have.

It isnt your right to use the farm, because its completely possible to build and use another farm in a different location, just hope nobobdy else logs in

I am not required to tell you why, and i wont.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

The issue with this is that it isn’t any ordinary XP farm, effectively there can only be one ender farm before the spawn rates become a little jacked up, or it gets over crowded. This isn’t like a farm in the regular world where the entire server can be using 10 different spawners, if there is somebody outside the XP farm while you’re using it nothing will work.

Quite frankly, it isn’t fair that you dive in first and then deny the community a right to use the end to its full potential. I’m still yet to get any reasoning what so ever from you, or any of your castle residence in regard to what happened that caused you take this “luxury” (or more basic right) away from the community.

As for the multiple accounts, we will see, I’ve never seen him online so I’ll be watching very closely when the residence expires.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

[quote=“Tarkoff, post:15, topic:443098”]I dident want this post to get in to a bitching match.
There is no problem here.
They have every right to protect it as they did build it, my only issue was just the odd player.
If people want to res the end or the neither why is that an issue? Any where player build something they want protected.
People are just mad cause it was such a good xp farm

Now Ill have to go make my own.[/quote]Idc tbh res will expire and we will see if he comes back on to renew it.

Read full topic

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @Tarkoff Tarkoff
item.description:
@Tarkoff wrote:

I dident want this post to get in to a bitching match.
There is no problem here.
They have every right to protect it as they did build it, my only issue was just the odd player.
If people want to res the end or the neither why is that an issue? Any where player build something they want protected.
People are just mad cause it was such a good xp farm

Now Ill have to go make my own.

item.title: Multi account?
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:13, topic:443098”][quote author=badger41 link=topic=545787.msg4002980#msg4002980 date=1338264825]

[quote author=zuppers link=topic=545787.msg4002938#msg4002938 date=1338260006]

[quote author=badger41 link=topic=545787.msg4002927#msg4002927 date=1338259035]

Hes a friend from another server, and i havent even played minecraft in quite some time, nor have alot of the ‘castle crew’ as you describe us.

It became essential to protect the farm due to someone else trying to claim it, and some other situations that make me feel like a few members dont deserve the luxury.
[/quote]I’m not sure why res is enabled for the end anyway lol, unless its not optional?

why shouldn’t it be? the end is a branch of world 1, and so is the nether.

It became essential to protect the farm due to someone else trying to claim it, and some other situations that make me feel like a few members dont deserve the luxury.

that has nothing to do with it
[/quote]No one can try and take it from you if there is no res there.

1_end, >1 >world 1 > residence

might as well question reisdences as a whole in world 1 if youre questioning them in the end.
[/quote]Your right res should be removed.[/quote]

oh well, iirc you live in world 2 anyway

Read full topic
